name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-pdf
description: Read and interact with PDF files using an interactive viewer with search, navigation, and text extraction

tools.name: list_pdfs
tools.description: List available PDF files that can be displayed

tools.name: display_pdf
tools.description: Display an interactive PDF viewer with search and navigation

tools.name: read_pdf_bytes
tools.description: Read a range of bytes from a PDF file (max 512KB per request)
